Description:
Located in the city center, this welcoming apartment lets you experience it all in São Paulo. Let your feet make short work of the 13-minute walk to Aclimacao Park or easily tackle the quick 2-minute drive to Paulista Avenue. Check out other neighborhoods and see more of São Paulo by hopping on a metro at either Ana Rosa Station, a short 7-minute walk away, or Paraiso Station, 14 minutes away.

As you settle into the place, you'll find a sitting area, a safe, air conditioning, and a desk. Connect to the free WiFi, or get cozy in front of the Smart TV. Bathroom amenities include towels and soap. The kitchen is equipped with a stovetop and a refrigerator, as well as a microwave, cookware, and a toaster oven. And because there's access to laundry facilities, you can go a bit lighter on your packing. Other amenities include bed sheets, blackout drapes/curtains, soundproofing, and housekeeping.
